Deferred tax

Tax losses carried forward have not been recognised at 31 December 2017. Whilst management forecast that taxable profits will be generated in the near future, there is a lack of evidenced profitability to date. Therefore no deferred tax asset has been recognised on these losses as there is no certainty that sufficient profits will arise in future accounting periods from which these losses could be offset. The estimated unrecognised deferred tax asset is US$571,891 (2016: US$830,271).
